1.0.name: wordpress/simple-seller
1.0.description: SimpleSeller adds a new post type to a WP blog, which represents a sellable item. Each author ("seller") enters their own payment credentials, and posts are linked to that seller's payment gateway with a simple buy-now type button. A separate capabilities set allows the blog owner to differentiate between those allowed to post blog entries and those allowed to sell items.
